pageContext.claim: “Uh-oh CNN just turned off their camera again. They always turn off their camera. Why do I keep doing that? You know, every time I do it, they turn off their camera. They did it last time. I mentioned CNN, they're screamin' turn the camera off. It's true.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump sometimes falsely claims that he can see a camera light indicating that CNN is cutting away from his rally in real time.
